mapper.insert: INSERT INTO courses (teacher_id, room_id, group_id, subject_id) VALUES (#{teacherId}, #{roomId}, #{groupId}, #{subjectId})
mapper.sql: SELECT c.id as id, s.id as subject_id, s.name as subject_name, t.id as teacher_id, t.first_name as teacher_first_name, t.last_name as teacher_last_name, r.id as room_id, r.building as room_building, r.floor as room_floor, r.room_number as room_room_number, g.id as group_id, st.id as group_student_id, st.first_name as group_student_first_name, st.last_name as group_student_last_name FROM courses c LEFT JOIN subjects s on c.subject_id=s.id LEFT JOIN teachers t on c.teacher_id=t.id LEFT JOIN rooms r on c.room_id=r.id LEFT JOIN student_groups g on c.group_id=g.id LEFT JOIN students st on g.id=st.group_id
mapper.update: UPDATE courses SET teacher_id=#{teacherId}, room_id=#{roomId}, group_id=#{groupId}, subject_id=#{subjectId} WHERE id=#{courseId}
